name: Clif Bar Chocolate Chunk With Sea Salt
description:
Clif’s new Sweet and Salty line taps into that irresistible flavour combination that always seems to taste like more. Loaded with chunks of rich dark chocolate and just the right amount of sea salt, the bars is fun fuel.Ingredients: brown rice syrup, rolled oats, soy protein isolate, cane syrup, roasted soybeans, rice flour, cane sugar, oat fibre, unsweetened chocolate, soy flour, high-oleic sunflower or, natural flavours, unsweetened chocolate, cane sugar, sea salt, cocoa butter., salt, barley malt extract, cocoa butter, soy lecithin.70% organic ingredients.Contains: barley, oats and soyMay contain: peanuts, tree nuts, milk, rye, triticale and wheat.
